citeinfo.title: Standard erosion pin data from Cumberland Island National Seashore (CUIS), February 2012 - May 2013
Spatial and Temporal Assessment of Back-Barrier Erosion on Cumberland Island National Seashore, Georgia, 2011–2013

descript.abstract: This dataset contains cumulative erosion magnitude measured at individual erosion pins at select sites along the western margin of CUIS. Additionally, the data are presented as rates and summarized to the site level to facilitate comparison with other methods used to estimate erosion with slightly varying temporal ranges.
descript.purpose: These data were collected to evaluate the spatial and temporal behavior of erosion at select locations along the back barrier of CUIS. The primary goal of the standard erosion pins was to provide a context which to view the continuous erosion by having a better understanding of the variability along a greater reach of the selected margins. The standard pins also allowed a quantification of gross erosion between site visits providing important data when PEEPs became completely exposed thus collecting no meaningful data.

idinfo.datacred: funding provided by National Park Service Cumberland Island National Seashore

attracc.attraccr: No formal attribute accuracy tests were conducted

dataqual.logic: No formal logical accuracy tests were conducted
dataqual.complete: Data set is considered complete for the information presented, as described in the abstract. Users are advised to read the rest of the metadata record carefully for additional details.

horizpa.horizpar: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

vertacc.vertaccr: No formal positional accuracy tests were conducted

procstep.procdesc: Data were processed by creating cumulative erosion magnitude/distance from each pin by summing values from individual site visits and then averaging cumulative magnitudes and rates over each sites.

enttyp.enttypd: Magnitude and rates of erosion at individual erosion pins along 4 sites - Brickhill Bluff (bb), Dungeness Wharf (dw), Plum Orchard (po), and Racoon Key (rk) - on CUIS and summarized to the site level

attr.attrdef: Site identifier to which the data belong -

attrdomv.udom: two letter representation of the site id
identification assigned to each vertical nest of pins

attr.attrdef: vertical sequence of pins - top, middle, bottom

attrdomv.udom: vertical sequence of pins - top, middle, bottom

attr.attrdef: number of days in record used for converting erosion magnitude into a rate

attrdomv.udom: number of days in record used for converting erosion magnitude into a rate

attr.attrdef: cumulative distance of margin retreat at pin location in millimeters

attrdomv.udom: cumulative distance of margin retreat at pin location in millimeters (mm)

attr.attrdef: estimated daily rate of erosion in mm per day

attrdomv.udom: estimated daily rate of erosion in mm per day

attr.attrdef: estimated annual rate of erosion in meters (m) per year

attrdomv.udom: estimated annual rate of erosion in meters (m) per year

attr.attrdef: median of annual erosion rate in meters per year based on all pins located at a site

attrdomv.udom: median of annual erosion rate in meters per year based on all pins located at a site

attr.attrdef: average annual erosion rate in meters per year based on all pins located at a site

attrdomv.udom: average of annual erosion rates in meters per year based on all pins located at a site
